programs.name: Federal Solar Tax Credit (ITC)
programs.description: Federal tax credit for solar energy systems installed on residential properties
programs.eligibility: Homeowners who install solar panels on their primary or secondary residence
programs.howToApply: File Form 5695 with your federal tax return

programs.name: California Clean Vehicle Rebate Project (CVRP)
programs.description: State rebate program for zero-emission and plug-in hybrid vehicles
programs.eligibility: California residents with household income requirements
programs.howToApply: Apply online after vehicle purchase or lease

programs.name: LADWP Solar Incentive Program
programs.description: Local rebate for installing solar panels in Los Angeles
programs.eligibility: LADWP customers in Los Angeles County
programs.incentiveAmount: Varies based on system size and type
